idea:
Lama is a brand of comfortware apparel and products created by Kumbhkaran Comfort LLP, an Indian startup founded by a team of Mumbai-based entrepreneurs. 

Lama aims to introduce a variety of sleep and comfort based products, including animal-free cruelty-free sherpa wool wearable blankets, oversized XXXL blankets, unique types of weighted blankets, amongst a basket of products to help an individual relax at home and sleep better.
name: KUMBHKARAN COMFORT LLP

idea: Penkraft®’s concept of ‘course in a box’ means that everything that you need for undergoing a course, be it in art & craft, handwriting improvement, or calligraphy is included in the box. The box thus consists of the coursebook, the course schedule, practice books and equipment such as the calligraphy nibs, pens, pencils, etc for the particular course.
name: PENKRAFT IDEAS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
